Function Summmary
Stringuuid()
    Creates a random (type 4) UUID.
Stringtimestamp()
    Creates a time stamp using ISO 8601 format and the Z (Zulu) time zone.
Stringtimestamp(String pattern)
    Creates a time stamp using the given pattern.
StringuserName()
    Returns the login name of the current user.
